snippet: The move for voluntary guidelines disappointed advocates for regulation of the product, which has been linked to the deaths of elderly patients.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration and Consumer Product Safety Commission announce call for committee to update voluntary standards for adult portable bed rails, which have been linked to deaths of hundreds of elderly patients; standards were developed by ASTM International, organization that develops and publishes voluntary technical standards for wide range of products.
lead_paragraph: The move for voluntary guidelines disappointed advocates for regulation of the product, which has been linked to the deaths of elderly patients.

headline.main: U.S. Agencies to Develop Standards for Bed Rails
headline.print_headline: U.S. Agencies Push to Update Standards For Bed Rails
